issue.title: [C++] Share more of the IPC testing utils with the rest of Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5141](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5141). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some APIs in `arrow/ipc/test-common.h` aren't really IPC-specific. Furthermore, `arrow/ipc/test-common.h` is already included in non-IPC tests. Those APIs should be moved to the Arrow-wide testing utilities.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5141?focusedCommentId=16913745) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Can we move the data examples to `arrow/testing/example_data.h` or something?
